search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t values(Authentication.src_nt_domain) as domains from datamodel=Authentication where nodename=Authentication.Failed_Authentication Authentication.action="failure" | mvexpand domains | sort domains

table.title: User accounts with more than 10 lockout reports

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count, min(_time) AS first, max(_time) AS last from datamodel=Change where nodename=All_Changes.Account_Management All_Changes.result="lockout" All_Changes.Account_Management.src_nt_domain=$domain$ by All_Changes.src,All_Changes.dest,All_Changes.Account_Management.src_nt_domain,All_Changes.user | sort - count | where count > 10 | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Changes")` | `drop_dm_object_name("Account_Management")` | eval first=strftime(first, "%F %T") | eval last=strftime(last, "%F %T") | fields src_nt_domain user src dest count first last | rename src_nt_domain AS "Domain", user AS "Username", src AS "Source host", dest AS "Destination host", count AS "Count", first AS "First Event", last AS "Last Event"

panel.title: Failed login by source host, source domain

search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t count, min(_time) AS first, max(_time) AS last, values(Authentication.user) as user values(Authentication.dest) as dest from datamodel=Authentication where nodename=Authentication.Failed_Authentication Authentication.action="failure" Authentication.src_nt_domain=$domain$ by Authentication.src,Authentication.src_nt_domain | sort - count | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | `drop_dm_object_name("Failed_Authentication")` | eval first=strftime(first, "%F %T") | eval last=strftime(last, "%F %T") | eval srcLengte=len(src) | eval subDest=substr(dest,1,srcLengte) | eval isDC=if(like(lower(dest),"%dc%"),1,0) | where isDC==0 AND lower(src)==lower(subDest) | fields src_nt_domain user src dest count | rename src_nt_domain AS "Domain", user AS "UserID", src AS "Source host", dest AS "Destination host", count AS "Count", first AS "First Event", last AS "Last Event"
